title: Sweet potato, carrot, apple and red lentil soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped', '3 large carrots, peeled and chopped', '1 apple, peeled, cored and chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '100g red lentils', '1/2 teaspoon minced fresh ginger', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1L vegetable stock', 'plain yogurt or crumbled feta cheese, to serve']
